title: Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area: Superintendents Compendium
body: Superintendents Compendium        View from Upper Layout Creek Pete Sawtell   Â    Listing of Special Regulations in Effect for Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area  Authorized by Title 16, United States Code, Section 3, and Title 36, Code of Federal Regulations, Parts 1 through 7, the following regulations are established by the Park Superintendent for the proper management, protection and public use of Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area.  These regulations apply in addition to the criminal laws of the United States and the regulations contained in Title 36 of the Code of Federal Regulations. A person convicted of violating a provision of these regulations shall be punished by a fine as provided by law, or by imprisonment not exceeding 6 months, or both, and shall be adjudged to pay all costs of the proceedings.  Superintendent's Compendium 2015
